name: math-quest-portal
description: Practice math exams for grades 1-8 with competition-style questions

scripts.build: mkdir -p www && cp index.html app.js auth.js questions.js styles.css manifest.json service-worker.js www/ && cp -r icons www/
scripts.ios:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
scripts.ios: npm run ios:sync && npm run ios:open
